youtube.title: Why Your Jaw Clicks: TMJ Anatomy Explained
youtube.description: Ever wonder why your jaw makes a clicking or popping noise? This 3D medical animation explains the anatomy of the Temporomandibular Joint (TMJ) and what causes that common clicking sound when you open your mouth. Perfect for biology students and curious minds!
